note: Personal injuries: Exodus 21:12-27; Code 195-223. Law of retaliation (lex talionis):
Harm to a pregnant woman: Exodus 21:22-25; Code 209-14. Goring of an ox: Exodus 21:28-36; Code 250-51. Disputed ownership: Exodus 22:9-13; Code 120-26.
source: Exodus 20:16; 23:1-3; Leviticus 19:11-12; Deuteronomy 5:20; 19:15, 18-20; Code 3-4. Stealing (theft): Exodus 20:15; 21:16; 22:1-8; Leviticus 19:11-12; Deuteronomy
title: Hammurabi given by number as in ANET, 163-80. They may also be found on the Internet under “Code of Hammurabi
Treatment of a thief: Exodus 22:1-8; Code 21-23. Buying and selling slaves
